normalised: Beyond inspiration, athlete biographies often reveal the socio-economic contexts that shape careers. We see glimpses of financial hardships, family pressures, and societal expectations that athletes like Mary Kom had to overcome. The value of land in Manipur, or the cost of specialized training equipment (running into several lakhs of rupees), are often revealed, adding another layer of understanding. These details, like the size of their childhood homes (maybe just four hundred square feet) paint a vivid picture.
